text:
Katy Perry Confirms She is ‘Not Single’ During ‘American Idol’ Finale

So, like, she's totally back with Orlando Bloom, we assume!
title: Katy Perry Confirms She is ‘Not Single’ During ‘American Idol’ Finale

og.title: Katy Perry Confirms She is "Not Single" During 'American Idol' Finale
og.description: Sorry, guys! Katy Perry is officially off the market, and we’re PRETTY sure this means she’s back with Orlando Bloom.
